“pakshayak kiyanne minissunge ekathuwak.ema pakshayak athule prashna athiwima samanya deyak.deshapalana pakshawalaya hama awasthawakadima abhiyoga thibenawa.ekathuwela sitiyadi wiwidha mathawada,prashna athiwenawa.ape pakshaya athuleth wiwidha mathawadi aragala wiwidha awasthawaladi pananaginawa.eewa itha buddhimathwa samanaya karaganima thamayi ape wagakima wiya yuththe.ape pakshaye thindu thirana ganne ekathuwela thamayi.namuth wiwidha matha idiripathwana awastha thibenawa.wiwidha matha darana aya innawa, matha thiyena aya innawa* yayi pawasa sitiyeya.
